entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Red Earth Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:19 p.m. MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local smoke. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Local smoke. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Local smoke. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
